remarks: Value of the object part of the functor composition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cofuval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
cofuval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Func E ) ) $.
cofu1st $p |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` ( G o.func F ) ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ) $.
